text: Municipal elections were held in Hajdúsámson, Hajdú-Bihar County in Hungary in 2010. ==Results== ===Mayor=== {| class=wikitable style=text-align:right !Candidate !Party !Votes !% |- |align=left|Gabor Hamza||align=left|Democratic Confederation of Free Trade Unions|| ||80.47 |- |align=left|János Piroska||align=left|Fidesz||354||13.75 |- |align=left|Imre Sorosi||align=left|Democratic Confederation of Free Trade Unions||149||5.79 |- |align=left colspan=2|Total|| ||100 |} ===Council=== The elected members were: *Péterné Ács *Zoltán Bacskai *Róbert Farkas *Csaba Fekete *István Zoltán Fekete *Jánosné Józan *Zoltán Sándor Kerekes *Ferenc Papp *Gábor Sólyom *József Cseke *István Hermann *János Magyar Pistai *Zoltán Tar Category:2010 in Hungary Category:2010 elections in Europe Category:Local elections in Hungary Municipal election, 2010
title: 2010 Hajdúsámson municipal election
